metadata.title: CVE-2017-8925 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The omninet_open function in drivers/usb/serial/omninet.c in the Linuxkernel before 4.10.4 allows local users to cause a denial of service (ttyexhaustion) by leveraging reference count mishandling.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8925` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-125-generic - 3.13.0-125.174
linux-image-3.13.0-125-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-125.174
linux-image-3.13.0-125-lowlatency - 3.13.0-125.174
linux-image-3.13.0-125-powerpc-e500 - 3.13.0-125.174
linux-image-3.13.0-125-powerpc-e500mc - 3.13.0-125.174
linux-image-3.13.0-125-powerpc-smp - 3.13.0-125.174
linux-image-3.13.0-125-powerpc64-emb - 3.13.0-125.174
linux-image-3.13.0-125-powerpc64-smp - 3.13.0-125.174
linux-image-extra-3.13.0-125-generic - 3.13.0-125.174
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-75-generic - 4.4.0-75.96~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-75-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-75.96~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-75-lowlatency - 4.4.0-75.96~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-75-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-75.96~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-75-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-75.96~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-75-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-75.96~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-75-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-75.96~14.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-75-generic - 4.4.0-75.96~14.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1002-aws - 4.4.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1023-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.13.0-125.174').
